rooms.description: Vastu-compliant entrance hall aligned to east for auspiciousness with natural light and positive energy flow.
Open-plan living area combined with kitchen, featuring exposed concrete finishes and minimalistic furniture. The layout ensures connectivity with the central courtyard.
Dedicated home office space positioned in the northwest corner as per Vastu guidelines to promote creativity and productivity.
Small utility bathroom located near kitchen for convenience, ensuring privacy while maintaining the design language of Brutalism.

openings.description: Large, robust entrance door in the east-facing wall to invite positive energy as per Vastu principles.
Multiple windows integrated into walls for ample natural light and ventilation throughout the studio apartment.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with built-in storage, located in the north-east to harness beneficial energy.
Secondary bedroom for children or guests, positioned in a quiet area of the upper floor.
Additional study space adjacent to the master bedroom for privacy and focus, designed with a minimalist approach.

openings.description: Balcony overlooking the central courtyard providing natural light and ventilation as per Vastu recommendations.
